description.action: Evan stands in the center of the courtyard, his arms raised in celebration as he leads the other children in cheering and singing.
Isaac jumps and twirls, his koala-like movements reflecting his joy at their victory.
Aaron stomps around the courtyard, his dinosaur-like roars adding to the celebratory atmosphere.
Aurelia giggles and claps her hands, her panda-like mannerisms lending a playful energy to the scene.
